greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse of "Tree of Eratosthenes" permutation: a(1) = 0, after which, a(2n) = 1 + 2*a(n), a(2n+1) = 2 * a(A268674(2n+1)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1024
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of related permutations:
xref: Similar permutations: A156552, A252756, A054429, A250246, A269388.
Differs from A156552 for the first time at n=21, where a(21) = 14, while A156552(21) = 18.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 02 2015
ext: Name edited and formula corrected by _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 31 2018
